dashboard.title: Training Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your AI-powered training companion
dashboard.setRaceGoal: Set a race goal to see training paces
dashboard.addGoal: Add your first race goal to get personalized training recommendations
dashboard.loginRequiredMessage: Please log in to view your training dashboard.

readiness.readyForQualityDesc: Your body is well-recovered and ready for hard training.
readiness.moderateTrainingDesc: Some fatigue present. Consider moderate intensity today.
readiness.recoveryFocusDesc: High fatigue detected. Prioritize rest or easy activity.

workouts.title: Workouts
workouts.subtitle: View and analyze your training history

garmin.title: Garmin Connect
garmin.subtitle: Sync your activities from Garmin
garmin.securityNote: Your password is only used for this sync request and is not stored. We recommend using HTTPS in production.
garmin.securityNoteEncrypted: Your credentials will be securely stored on the server to enable automatic daily syncing.
garmin.error: Please enter your Garmin Connect email and password
garmin.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Garmin account?

sync.title: Sync Activities
sync.subtitle: Connect to Garmin to import your activities
sync.howItWorksDesc: Enter your Garmin Connect credentials. Your password is only used for this sync request and is not stored.
sync.selectDays: Select how many days of activities you want to import. More days means longer sync time.
sync.activitiesStored: Activities are downloaded and stored locally. You can then analyze them with AI-powered insights.

connect.title: Connect Services
connect.subtitle: Import your workouts and share your analysis

plans.title: Training Plans
plans.subtitle: Create and manage your training plans
plans.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plan?
plans.notFoundDesc: The plan you are looking for does not exist.

goals.title: Race Goals
goals.subtitle: Set your race targets
goals.noGoalsDesc: Add your first race goal to get started

errors.notFoundDesc: The page you are looking for does not exist.

chat.title: AI Coach
chat.subtitle: Your personal AI training assistant
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your training...
chat.emptyDescription: Ask me about your training, fitness metrics, workout recommendations, or anything related to your athletic performance.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.lockedDescription: AI Coach Chat unlocks at Level {level}. Keep training to level up!
chat.disclaimer: AI responses are for informational purposes. Always consult a professional for medical advice.

vo2max.title: VO2 Max
vo2max.syncGarmin: Sync with Garmin to see your VO2 Max

tooltip.title: VO2 Max (Maximal Oxygen Uptake)
tooltip.description: The maximum amount of oxygen your body can use during intense exercise. Higher values indicate better cardiovascular fitness. Elite runners typically have 70+ ml/kg/min. Improve it with consistent aerobic training and high-intensity intervals.

achievements.vo2max_first_desc: Record your first VO2 Max measurement
achievements.vo2max_up_3_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 3% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_5_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 5% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_10_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 10% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_15_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 15% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_trend_4w_desc: VO2 Max trending upward for 4 consecutive weeks
achievements.vo2max_trend_8w_desc: VO2 Max trending upward for 8 consecutive weeks
achievements.zone5_warrior_desc: Accumulate 60 minutes in heart rate Zone 5
achievements.vo2max_pr_desc: Set a new personal VO2 Max record

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Track your progress and unlock rewards
achievements.keepTraining: Keep training to unlock your first achievement!

earlyWin.title: Early Win!
earlyWin.firstStepsDesc: Log in for the first time after connecting your device
earlyWin.profileCompleteDesc: Fill out your profile and preferences
earlyWin.firstWorkoutLoggedDesc: Log your first workout (synced or manual)
earlyWin.earlyBirdDesc: Log in before 7am - rise and shine!
earlyWin.nightOwlDesc: Log in after 10pm - burning the midnight oil!
earlyWin.explorerDesc: Visit 3 different pages to explore the app
earlyWin.curiousMindDesc: View workout details for the first time

unlockCelebration.title: Feature Unlocked!
unlockCelebration.levelReached: You've reached Level {level} and unlocked this feature!

levelRewards.title: Level Rewards
levelRewards.subtitle: Unlock new features as you progress

5.name: Dedicated
5.title: Dedicated Athlete
5.description: Advanced metrics and fatigue modeling unlocked!

8.name: Committed
8.title: Committed Trainer
8.description: AI Coach chat and personalized tips unlocked!

10.name: Athlete
10.title: Serious Athlete
10.description: Training plan generation and race predictions unlocked!

15.title: Advanced Performer

20.name: Expert
20.title: Training Expert

25.name: Elite
25.title: Elite Performer
25.description: Coach mode unlocked - help others train!

30.name: Master
30.title: Training Master
30.description: All features unlocked + early access to new features!

strava.title: Strava Integration
strava.subtitle: Share your workout analysis to Strava
strava.pageSubtitle: Connect your Strava account to automatically share workout analysis
strava.notConnectedDesc: Connect your Strava account to automatically update your activity descriptions with AI-powered workout analysis.
strava.autoUpdateDescriptionHint: Automatically update Strava activity descriptions when workouts are analyzed
strava.includeScoreHint: Add the overall workout quality score to your Strava description
strava.includeSummaryHint: Add a one-line summary of your workout performance
strava.includeLinkHint: Add a link to view the full workout analysis
strava.useExtendedFormatHint: Include additional details like training effect and recovery time
strava.permissionsTitle: Strava will request the following permissions:
strava.howItWorksStep1: Connect your Strava account using the button above. You'll be redirected to Strava to authorize the connection.
strava.howItWorksStep2: After your workouts are analyzed, the analysis will be automatically added to your Strava activity description.
strava.howItWorksStep3: Your friends on Strava will see your workout score and a link to view the full analysis.
strava.featureAutoSyncDesc: Workouts are automatically detected and analyzed
strava.featureAnalysisDesc: Get detailed insights about your performance
strava.featureShareDesc: Your workout analysis appears on your Strava activity
strava.callbackConnectingDesc: Please wait while we complete the connection
strava.callbackSuccessDesc: Your Strava account is now connected
strava.callbackSuccessWithName: Welcome, {name}! Your Strava account is now connected.
strava.errorAccessDenied: You denied access to your Strava account
strava.errorNoCode: No authorization code received from Strava

zones.title: Training Zones
zones.subtitle: View your heart rate zones and training paces

trainingPaces.title: Training Paces
trainingPaces.description: Recommended paces for different training intensities
trainingPaces.tooltip: Training paces are calculated based on your race goals and current fitness level. They help you train at the right intensity for different workout types.
trainingPaces.noPaces: Set a race goal to see training paces

hrZones.title: Heart Rate Zones
hrZones.description: Intensity zones based on your max heart rate
hrZones.tooltip: Heart rate zones help you train at the right intensity. Zone 1 is easy recovery, while Zone 5 is maximum effort. Training in different zones develops different physiological adaptations.

physiology.title: Physiological Metrics
physiology.description: Your key heart rate and performance metrics
physiology.tooltip: These metrics are the foundation for calculating your training zones and paces. They're based on your recent training data and Garmin measurements.
physiology.vdotTooltip: VDOT is a measure of your running fitness developed by Jack Daniels. Higher values indicate better aerobic capacity and running economy.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Start your training journey today!
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

featureGate.almostThereLevel: Almost there! Reach Level {level} to unlock

dataFreshness.staleWarning: Data is older than {hours} hours. Consider refreshing.

purpose.title: What drives you?
purpose.subtitle: Understanding your WHY helps us keep you motivated on tough days and celebrate your wins.
purpose.customHint: Tell us what matters most to you
purpose.whyNote: Research shows that athletes who connect with their 'why' are 42% more likely to reach their goals.

descriptions.first_5k: Start your running journey with a achievable milestone
descriptions.first_10k: Double the distance, double the achievement
descriptions.first_half: Join the 21K club with your first half
descriptions.beat_pb: Push past your limits and set new records
descriptions.stay_healthy: Make movement a sustainable part of life
descriptions.lose_weight: Transform your body through consistent training
descriptions.enjoy_more: Find joy in every stride and breath

streak_broken.title: Your streak needs you
streak_broken.message: It's been a few days. Your body is ready - let's get back on track.
streak_broken.quote: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.

inactive.title: We miss you out there
inactive.message: It's been a while since your last workout. Every champion has rest days, but they always come back.
inactive.quote: It's not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.

check_in.title: How are you feeling?
check_in.message: Just checking in to remind you why you started this journey.
check_in.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.

encouragement.title: Keep up the great work!
encouragement.message: You're building something amazing. Stay focused on your goal.
encouragement.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.

welcome.privacyNote: Your data stays secure. We never share your training information with third parties.

connection.title: Connect Your Device
connection.subtitle: Import your workouts automatically or enter them manually
connection.garminDesc: Sync activities, heart rate, and advanced metrics
connection.stravaDesc: Import activities and share analysis with friends
connection.manualDesc: Log workouts manually without connecting a device
connection.skipDesc: Set up sync later in settings
connection.benefit1: Automatic workout import after each activity
connection.benefit2: Heart rate zones and training metrics

profile.title: Personalize Your Experience
profile.subtitle: Help us tailor recommendations to your goals
profile.raceDistanceLabel: What distance are you training for?
profile.weeklyHoursLabel: How many hours can you train per week?
profile.weeklyHoursHint: We'll adapt recommendations to fit your schedule
profile.intermediateDesc: Some experience with training plans (1-3 years)
profile.advancedDesc: Experienced athlete with solid training history (3+ years)
profile.zoneMethodLabel: How would you like to set your training zones?
profile.zoneAutoDesc: We'll calculate zones from your recent training data
profile.zoneLthrDesc: Enter your threshold heart rate from a field test
profile.zoneMaxHrDesc: Enter your known max HR from a max effort
profile.lthrHint: Your heart rate at lactate threshold (from a 30-min time trial)
profile.maxHrHint: Your highest heart rate ever recorded
profile.zoneAutoInfo: We'll analyze your workout data to estimate your zones. The more data we have, the more accurate the zones become.
profile.readyDesc: Your personalized training dashboard is ready. Let's start your journey!

featureIntro.dashboardDesc: See your readiness score, fitness metrics, and daily training recommendations at a glance.
featureIntro.workoutsDesc: View all your synced activities with AI-powered analysis and insights.
featureIntro.metricsWhyDesc: Tap any metric to learn what it means and why it matters for your training.
featureIntro.zonesDesc: Heart rate and pace zones calibrated to your fitness level.
featureIntro.achievementsDesc: Earn XP and unlock badges for consistency, performance, and milestones.
featureIntro.progressDesc: See how your fitness is improving over time with trend analysis.
featureIntro.aiChatDesc: Get personalized training advice from your AI coach. Unlocks at Level 8!
featureIntro.plansDesc: Generate custom training plans for your race goals. Unlocks at Level 10!

noWorkouts.title: Welcome to trAIner!
noWorkouts.content: Connect your Garmin account to import your workouts and get personalized AI-powered training insights.

firstWorkoutSynced.title: Your Readiness Score
firstWorkoutSynced.content: This gauge shows how ready your body is for training today. Green means you're recovered and ready for hard efforts. Yellow suggests moderate training. Red indicates you should focus on recovery.

firstAnalysisViewed.title: Earn XP as You Train
firstAnalysisViewed.content: Every workout you complete and analyze earns you experience points (XP). Level up to unlock new features like AI Coach chat, training plans, and more!

firstAchievementEarned.title: Achievement Unlocked!
firstAchievementEarned.content: You've earned your first achievement! Achievements reward consistency, performance milestones, and training goals. Each achievement gives you XP to level up faster.

levelUp.title: Level {level} Unlocked!
levelUp.content: Congratulations! You've unlocked new features: {features}. Keep training to unlock even more powerful tools!
levelUp.noNewFeatures: Keep going to unlock more features

focusView.readyForQualityMessage: Your body is recovered and ready for hard work.
focusView.goodForSteadyMessage: Your body is responding well. Keep building.
focusView.focusOnRecoveryMessage: Your body needs rest. Recovery is progress.

runWalk.title: Run/Walk Intervals
runWalk.subtitle: Couch-to-5K style interval training
runWalk.templatesSubtitle: Progressive run/walk intervals to build your endurance
runWalk.saveTemplateSubtitle: Give your workout a name to save it for later
runWalk.stopConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to stop? Your progress will be lost.

rpe.title: Rate of Perceived Exertion
rpe.selectHint: Tap a number to see details about that effort level

manualWorkout.title: Log Workout
manualWorkout.subtitle: Record your workout without a device
manualWorkout.name: Workout Name
manualWorkout.notesPlaceholder: How did the workout feel? Any observations?
manualWorkout.loadExplanation: Based on duration and effort (session-RPE method)

errors.durationTooShort: Duration must be at least 1 minute
errors.distanceInvalid: Distance must be a positive number

success.title: Workout Logged!
success.message: Your {activityType} has been saved with an estimated load of {load}.

beginner.title: Beginner Mode
beginner.subtitle: Simplified interface for new runners
beginner.benefit1: Simplifies the dashboard with only essential metrics
beginner.benefit2: Shows RPE (perceived effort) instead of complex heart rate data
beginner.benefit3: Provides guided explanations for key concepts
beginner.benefit4: Gradually reveals advanced features as you progress
beginner.infoDescription: Beginner mode helps you focus on building consistency without being overwhelmed by numbers. You can disable it anytime to see advanced metrics.
beginner.confirmDisableMessage: This will show all advanced metrics like CTL, ATL, TSB, and detailed heart rate zones. You can always re-enable it later.
beginner.errorToggle: Failed to update beginner mode. Please try again.

preferences.title: Display Preferences
preferences.showHRMetricsHint: Display heart rate zones and HR-based training data
preferences.showAdvancedMetricsHint: Display CTL, ATL, TSB, and other training load metrics
preferences.weeklyMileageCapHint: Get alerts when approaching 10% weekly increase limit

comebackChallenge.title: Comeback Challenge
comebackChallenge.subtitle: Your {streak}-day streak broke, but champions never stay down!
comebackChallenge.motivationalMessage: Every champion has comebacks. This is your moment to prove that setbacks are just setups for greater comebacks.
comebackChallenge.callToAction: Complete a workout to finish Day {day}!

modal.title: Amazing Comeback!
modal.subtitle: You completed the 3-day comeback challenge!
modal.keepItUp: Keep training to build an even longer streak.
modal.motivationalQuote: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.

identity.subtitle: Create a commitment statement that reflects who you are as an athlete.
identity.chooseTemplate: Choose a template or write your own
identity.customPlaceholder: shows up every day for myself
identity.scienceNote: Research shows that identity-based commitments are 42% more effective than goal-based ones.

reinforcement.title: Remember Who You Are
reinforcement.subtitle: Take a moment to reconnect with your training identity.
reinforcement.note: Reinforcing your identity strengthens your commitment to training.

trains_consistently.description: Commit to showing up for your training every day

shows_up.statement: shows up even when it's hard
shows_up.description: Embrace the challenge and never give up

values_discipline.description: Build habits that don't depend on feeling motivated

never_quits.statement: never gives up on their goals

embraces_process.statement: loves the process, not just the results
embraces_process.description: Find joy in the journey itself

redZone.message1: Your body is telling you something important. Rest isn't weakness - it's wisdom.
redZone.message2: Your body is asking for rest. Listening to it is a sign of a smart athlete.
redZone.message3: Recovery is when adaptation happens. Your body is building strength right now.
redZone.action1: Consider a gentle walk or stretching today.
redZone.action2: Take today to recharge - you'll come back stronger.
redZone.action3: Use this time to mentally prepare for your next session.

streakBreak.message1: Life happens. One day doesn't erase all your progress.
streakBreak.message2: Missing a day is part of being human. What matters is getting back on track.
streakBreak.message3: Consistency isn't about perfection - it's about getting back up. You've got this.
streakBreak.action1: Start fresh tomorrow - your body remembers every workout.
streakBreak.action2: Plan your next workout now to make it easier to start again.
streakBreak.action3: A short, easy session can help you feel back in the rhythm.

plateau.title: Plateau Detected
plateau.message1: Plateaus are your body consolidating gains. They often precede breakthroughs.
plateau.message2: Progress isn't always linear. Your body is adapting in ways you can't see yet.
plateau.message3: Every great athlete has faced plateaus. They're not walls - they're launching pads.
plateau.action1: Trust the process - your next PR might be just around the corner.
plateau.action2: Consider varying your training - sometimes change sparks growth.
plateau.action3: Focus on technique or try a different type of workout.
plateau.bodyConsolidating: Your body is consolidating gains. This is a normal and important phase of athletic development. Stay consistent, and the breakthrough will come.
plateau.historicalTitle: Your {metric} history shows plateaus followed by gains
plateau.suggestion1: Try a new route or workout type to stimulate adaptation
plateau.suggestion2: Consider a recovery week - sometimes less is more
plateau.suggestion3: Review your sleep and nutrition - small changes can make big differences
plateau.encouragement: Every breakthrough started with a plateau. Keep going.

badWorkout.message1: Some days the legs just aren't there. That's normal and okay.
badWorkout.message2: One tough workout doesn't define your fitness. It's just one data point.
badWorkout.message3: Even the pros have off days. What separates them is showing up anyway.
badWorkout.action1: Rest well tonight - tomorrow is a new opportunity.
badWorkout.action2: Reflect on possible factors: sleep, nutrition, stress.
badWorkout.action3: Give yourself credit for putting in the effort.

comeback.message1: Every champion has comebacks. This is your story.
comeback.message2: Welcome back. Your past fitness is still there - let's bring it out again.
comeback.message3: The hardest part of a comeback is starting. You've already done that.
comeback.action1: Start slow and build gradually - your body will remember.
comeback.action2: Ease into training - patience now means faster progress later.
comeback.action3: Celebrate this moment - you're back in the game.

consistency.message1: Showing up is the hardest part. You've mastered it.
consistency.message2: Consistency beats intensity every time. You're proving that.
consistency.message3: Day after day, you've chosen to prioritize your health. That's powerful.
consistency.action1: Keep this momentum going - you're building an unshakeable habit.
consistency.action2: Your dedication is inspiring. Keep showing up for yourself.
consistency.action3: Take a moment to appreciate how far you've come.

recoveryDay.message1: Recovery isn't falling behind - it's building strength.
recoveryDay.message2: Rest is training too. Your body is adapting and getting stronger.
recoveryDay.message3: Active recovery accelerates your progress. Embrace the slower pace.
recoveryDay.action1: Use this time for mobility work or mental preparation.
recoveryDay.action2: Enjoy this recovery - you've earned it.
recoveryDay.action3: Try something gentle that brings you joy.
recoveryDay.tip2: Stay active without taxing your system

recovery.title: Your Body Needs Rest
recovery.bodyAskingRest: Your body is asking for rest. Listening is the smartest thing you can do.
recovery.redZoneMessage: You're in the red zone. Rest today to protect tomorrow's training.
recovery.yellowZoneMessage: You're in the yellow zone. Keep activity light and recovery-focused.
recovery.encouragement: Rest is when you get stronger. This is part of the process.
recovery.insufficientHRVData: Insufficient HRV data for trend analysis
recovery.scoreDescription: Recovery score based on sleep, HRV, and training load
recovery.connectDevice: Connect a device to track recovery metrics

celebration.title: New Personal Record!
celebration.subtitle: You just crushed it!
celebration.multiplePRs: You set {count} PRs in this workout!

history.title: Personal Records
history.empty: No personal records yet. Keep training!

patterns.insufficientData: Insufficient data for pattern analysis. Need at least 10 workouts.
